ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Independent Component Analysis (ICA) using various algorithms: FastICA, Information-Maximization (Infomax), and Joint Approximate Diagonalization of Eigenmatrices (JADE).
Independent Component Analysis (ICA) using various algorithms: FastICA, Information-Maximization (Infomax), and Joint Approximate Diagonalization of Eigenmatrices (JADE).

name: r-ica
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0-3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ica
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ica_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ica/ica_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 474d3530b16b76a1bf1a1114d24092678ea7215fa57c6fdcee6333f1e768b865

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ica')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ica')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ica
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: 'Independent Component Analysis (ICA) using various algorithms: FastICA, Information-Maximization (Infomax), and Joint Approximate Diagonalization of Eigenmatrices (JADE).'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - rvalieris

# Package: ica
# Type: Package
# Title: Independent Component Analysis
# Version: 1.0-2
# Date: 2018-05-24
# Author: Nathaniel E. Helwig <helwig@umn.edu>
# Maintainer: Nathaniel E. Helwig <helwig@umn.edu>
# Description: Independent Component Analysis (ICA) using various algorithms: FastICA, Information-Maximization (Infomax), and Joint Approximate Diagonalization of Eigenmatrices (JADE).
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-05-24 05:50:01 UTC; Nate
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-05-24 06:12:53 UTC
